flawed_nl_solution:
He knows 50 people are showing up and he’s hoping 40 more people will drop in for a total of 50+40 = <<50+40=60>>60 people
He’s made 10 extravagant gift bags and 20 average bags for a total of 10+20 = <<10+20=30>>30 bags
He hopes 60 people will show up and has already made 30 bags so he needs to make 60-30 = <<60-30=30>>30 more gift bags
#### 30

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 90, not 60. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
